name: Space Racer (nichi13)
description: This simple yet entertaining 2D Platformer game follows the path of an astronaut who must navigate the inner workings of a maze of platforms and walls in order to collect keys and pass through levels.  Space Racer was created in the fall of 2020 with a time constraint of two weeks. Most game assets were provided by MSU, but I created the pixel art and animations for the stars, coins, and enemies pictured.  However, my primary role was the designer of the game.
